name: 基本面技术面结合策略
description: 结合财务数据和技术指标的综合策略，同时考虑行业和大盘表现

净利润增长率.description: 最低净利润同比增长率(%)

buy_conditions.condition: get_financial_ratios(股票代码)['ROE'] > params['ROE阈值'] and RSI(收盘, params['RSI周期']) < 30
get_financial_statement('利润表', 股票代码, limit=2)['净利润'].pct_change().iloc[0] * 100 > params['净利润增长率'] and 收盘 > SMA(收盘, params['均线周期'])
buy_conditions.description: 净利润增长且股价站上均线

buy_conditions.condition: get_index_quotes('000001', limit=5)['收盘'].pct_change().mean() > 0 and get_stock_info(股票代码)['所属行业'].iloc[0] in get_industry_info()['行业名称'].values
buy_conditions.description: 大盘上涨且行业信息匹配

buy_conditions.condition: len(get_dragon_tiger_list(股票代码, limit=5)) > 0 and get_technical_indicators(股票代码, indicators=['MACD12_26_9'], limit=1)['MACD12_26_9'].iloc[0] > 0
buy_conditions.description: 近期上榜龙虎榜且MACD为正

sell_conditions.condition: 收盘 < SMA(收盘, params['均线周期']) * 0.95
get_table_data('股票风险', {'风险等级': '高'}, limit=100)['股票代码'].isin([股票代码])
